title: Lady Gaga falls off stage during Las Vegas show
text:
CLOSE Lady Gaga was performing in Las Vegas when she invited a fan up on stage. After the pair started dancing, he fell off the stage bringing the singer with him. USA TODAY

Lady Gaga took a tumble during her concert Thursday, according to reports.

The multi-Grammy Award winner was performing as part of her Las Vegas Residency at Park Theater at Park MGM resort when she fell off the stage, according to Entertainment Tonight and CNN.

In fan footage shared to social media, Gaga can be seen in the arms of a man, who falls off the stage, taking her with him.

"So what happened here, Gaga invited a fan to dance. He picked her up. They both tumbled into the pit," CNN's Alison Kosik reported early Friday morning. "No official word on injuries here, but fans at the show say she popped right back up and she just continued going. She was dancing and singing."

Entertainment Tonight also reports the man Gaga was dancing with was a fan.

USA TODAY has reached out to reps for Gaga for comment.

In a NSFW video shared to Twitter by an unverified account, the "Star is Born" actress appeared to recover quickly from the fall. She assured concert-goers: "Everything's OK."

"The only thing that's not OK is we need some stairs for the damn stage so I can get back up," she continued.

Gaga, understanding the ordeal was an accident, attempted to comfort the fan. "Hey, can you promise me something?" she asked. "Could you just forgive yourself right now for that happening...?"

"It takes two to tango," she added, also admitting: "I have fallen off the stage before."

The "Always Remember Us This Way" artist then put a romantic spin on the tumble. "You know what we did? We fell into each other's arms, Jack," she told the fan. "We're like Rose and Jack from the 'Titanic.' "

Following the concert, the 33-year-old singer showed her more than 37 million Instagram followers how she cared for her body.

"Post show routine: ice bath for 5-10 min, hot bath for 20, then compression suit packed with ice packs for 20," she captioned the three images depicting her ritual, one which is NSFW.

According to the MGM Resorts website, the Gaga is still set to perform Saturday night.
